div.a: Apply now for the 2020-21 school year

div.p: We are a small, free, open-enrollment grades 6-12 charter public school with a proven record of closing achievement and opportunity gaps for all students. We support and celebrate our community’s diversity, growth, and success. We take tremendous pride in ensuring every CCSC student is known, nurtured, and challenged.
Individualized attention and support in an intimate, caring community
Strong scores on the MCAS, SAT, and APs
100% of CCSC graduates are admitted to college

div.div: Community Charter School of Cambridge combines challenging academics with creative use of technology and real-world experience to prepare a diverse student body, grades 6-12, for postsecondary success and productive citizenship.
CCSC admits students entering grades 6-9 and does not require any entrance exam. Click here to learn more and fill out the one-page application.

Your support helps us continue to provide our students with resources and opportunities to grow as courageous and committed scholars and citizens. If you are interested in volunteering at CCSC or would like to make a donation, please click here.
CCSC teachers take part in hundreds of hours of professional development each year. Click here for current openings and come grow with us.
